00052 #define IS_ADC(x)                               (x == HT_ADC0)
00053 
00054 #define ONE_SHOT_MODE                           (0x00000000)
00055 #define CONTINUOUS_MODE                         (0x00000002)
00056 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_DISCON_MODE)
00057 #define IS_DISCONTINUOUS_MODE(x)                (0)
00058 #else
00059 #define DISCONTINUOUS_MODE                      (0x00000003)
00060 #define IS_DISCONTINUOUS_MODE(x)                (x == DISCONTINUOUS_MODE)
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #define IS_ADC_CONVERSION_MODE(REGULAR_MODE)    ((REGULAR_MODE == ONE_SHOT_MODE)   || \
00064                                                  (REGULAR_MODE == CONTINUOUS_MODE) || \
00065                                                  (IS_DISCONTINUOUS_MODE(REGULAR_MODE)))
00066 
00067 #define ADC_CH_0                                (0)
00068 #define ADC_CH_1                                (1)
00069 #define ADC_CH_2                                (2)
00070 #define ADC_CH_3                                (3)
00071 #define ADC_CH_4                                (4)

00073 #define ADC_CH_6                                (6)
00074 #define ADC_CH_7                                (7)
00075 
00076 #define IS_ADC_CHANNEL1(CHANNEL)                (((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_0) || ((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_1) || \
00077                                                  ((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_2) || ((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_3) || \
00078                                                  ((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_4) || ((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_5) || \
00079                                                  ((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_6) || ((CHANNEL) == ADC_CH_7))

00302 #define IS_ADC_CHANNEL(CHANNEL)                  (IS_ADC_CHANNEL1(CHANNEL) || \
00303                                                   IS_ADC_CHANNEL2(CHANNEL) || \
00304                                                   IS_ADC_CHANNEL3(CHANNEL) || \
00305                                                   IS_ADC_CH_INTERNAL1(CHANNEL))

00308 
00309 
00310 #define ADC_TRIG_SOFTWARE                       (1UL << 0)
00311 
00312 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_SW_TRIGGER_ONLY)
00313 #define IS_ADC_TRIG(REGTRIG)                    ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_SOFTWARE)
00314 #else
00315 /* ((ADCTCR[4] << 4) | (ADCTSR[20] << 20))                                                                  */
00316 #if (LIBCFG_CMP)
00317 #define ADC_TRIG_CMP0                           ((1UL << 4) | (0UL << 20))
00318 #define ADC_TRIG_CMP1                           ((1UL << 4) | (1UL << 20))
00319 #endif
00320 
00321 /* ((ADCTCR[3] << 3) | (ADCTSR[23:22] << 22) | (ADCTSR[19] << 19))                                          */
00322 #define ADC_TRIG_BFTM0                          ((1UL << 3) | (0UL << 22) | (0UL << 19))
00323 #if (LIBCFG_BFTM1)
00324 #define ADC_TRIG_BFTM1                          ((1UL << 3) | (0UL << 22) | (1UL << 19))
00325 #endif
00326 
00327 /* ((ADCTCR[3] << 3) | (ADCTSR[29:27]) << 27) | (ADCTSR[23:22] << 22) | (ADCTSR[19] << 19))                 */
00328 #if (LIBCFG_PWM0)
00329 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM0_MTO                       ((1UL << 3) | (0UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (0UL << 19))
00330 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH0O                      ((1UL << 3) | (1UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (0UL << 19))
00331 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH1O                      ((1UL << 3) | (2UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (0UL << 19))
00332 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH2O                      ((1UL << 3) | (3UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (0UL << 19))
00333 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH3O                      ((1UL << 3) | (4UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (0UL << 19))
00334 #endif
00335 #if (LIBCFG_PWM1)
00336 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM1_MTO                       ((1UL << 3) | (0UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (1UL << 19))
00337 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH0O                      ((1UL << 3) | (1UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (1UL << 19))
00338 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH1O                      ((1UL << 3) | (2UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (1UL << 19))
00339 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH2O                      ((1UL << 3) | (3UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (1UL << 19))
00340 #define ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH3O                      ((1UL << 3) | (4UL << 27) | (1UL << 22) | (1UL << 19))
00341 #endif
00342 
00343 /* ((ADCTCR[2] << 2) | (ADCTSR[26:24] << 24) | (ADCTSR[18:16] << 16))                                       */
00344 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM0)
00345 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_MTO                      ((1UL << 2) | (0UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00346 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0O                     ((1UL << 2) | (1UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00347 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1O                     ((1UL << 2) | (2UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00348 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2O                     ((1UL << 2) | (3UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00349 #define ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3O                     ((1UL << 2) | (4UL << 24) | (0UL << 16))
00350 #endif
00351 
00352 #if (LIBCFG_NO_GPTM0)
00353 #define IS_ADC_TRIG_GPTM0(x)                    (0)
00354 #else
00355 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_MTO                      ((1UL << 2) | (0UL << 24) | (2UL << 16))
00356 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH0O                     ((1UL << 2) | (1UL << 24) | (2UL << 16))
00357 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH1O                     ((1UL << 2) | (2UL << 24) | (2UL << 16))
00358 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH2O                     ((1UL << 2) | (3UL << 24) | (2UL << 16))
00359 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH3O                     ((1UL << 2) | (4UL << 24) | (2UL << 16))
00360 
00361 #define IS_ADC_TRIG_GPTM0(x)                    (((x) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_MTO)  || \
00362                                                  ((x) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH0O) || \
00363                                                  ((x) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH1O) || \
00364                                                  ((x) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH2O) || \
00365                                                  ((x) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM0_CH3O))
00366 #endif
00367 
00368 #if (LIBCFG_GPTM1)
00369 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_MTO                      ((1UL << 2) | (0UL << 24) | (3UL << 16))
00370 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH0O                     ((1UL << 2) | (1UL << 24) | (3UL << 16))
00371 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH1O                     ((1UL << 2) | (2UL << 24) | (3UL << 16))
00372 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH2O                     ((1UL << 2) | (3UL << 24) | (3UL << 16))
00373 #define ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH3O                     ((1UL << 2) | (4UL << 24) | (3UL << 16))
00374 #endif
00375 
00376 /* (ADCTCR[1] << 1) | (ADCTSR[11:8] << 8)                                                                   */
00377 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_0                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 0UL << 8))
00378 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_1                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 1UL << 8))
00379 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_2                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 2UL << 8))
00380 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_3                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 3UL << 8))
00381 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_4                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 4UL << 8))
00382 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_5                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 5UL << 8))
00383 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_6                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 6UL << 8))
00384 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_7                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 7UL << 8))
00385 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_8                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 8UL << 8))
00386 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_9                         ((1UL << 1) | ( 9UL << 8))
00387 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_10                        ((1UL << 1) | (10UL << 8))
00388 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_11                        ((1UL << 1) | (11UL << 8))
00389 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_12                        ((1UL << 1) | (12UL << 8))
00390 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_13                        ((1UL << 1) | (13UL << 8))
00391 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_14                        ((1UL << 1) | (14UL << 8))
00392 #define ADC_TRIG_EXTI_15                        ((1UL << 1) | (15UL << 8))
00393 
00394 #define IS_ADC_TRIG(REGTRIG)                    (IS_ADC_TRIG1(REGTRIG) || \
00395                                                  IS_ADC_TRIG2(REGTRIG) || \
00396                                                  IS_ADC_TRIG3(REGTRIG) || \
00397                                                  IS_ADC_TRIG4(REGTRIG) || \
00398                                                  IS_ADC_TRIG5(REGTRIG) || \
00399                                                  IS_ADC_TRIG6(REGTRIG) || \
00400                                                  IS_ADC_TRIG7(REGTRIG))
00401 
00402 #define IS_ADC_TRIG1(REGTRIG)                   (IS_ADC_TRIG_GPTM0(REGTRIG)         || \
00403                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_BFTM0)      || \
00404                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_0)     || \
00405                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_1)     || \
00406                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_2)     || \
00407                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_3)     || \
00408                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_4)     || \
00409                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_5)     || \
00410                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_6)     || \
00411                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_7)     || \
00412                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_8)     || \
00413                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_9)     || \
00414                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_10)    || \
00415                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_11)    || \
00416                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_12)    || \
00417                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_13)    || \
00418                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_14)    || \
00419                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_EXTI_15)    || \
00420                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_SOFTWARE))
00421 
00422 #if (LIBCFG_BFTM1)
00423 #define IS_ADC_TRIG2(REGTRIG)                   ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_BFTM1)
00424 #else
00425 #define IS_ADC_TRIG2(REGTRIG)                   (0)
00426 #endif
00427 
00428 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM0)
00429 #define IS_ADC_TRIG3(REGTRIG)                   (((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_MTO)  || \
00430                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH0O) || \
00431                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH1O) || \
00432                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH2O) || \
00433                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_MCTM0_CH3O) || \
00434                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_BFTM1))
00435 #else
00436 #define IS_ADC_TRIG3(REGTRIG)                   (0)
00437 #endif
00438 
00439 #if (LIBCFG_GPTM1)
00440 #define IS_ADC_TRIG4(REGTRIG)                   (((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_MTO)  || \
00441                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH0O) || \
00442                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH1O) || \
00443                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH2O) || \
00444                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_GPTM1_CH3O))
00445 #else
00446 #define IS_ADC_TRIG4(REGTRIG)                   (0)
00447 #endif
00448 
00449 #if (LIBCFG_PWM0)
00450 #define IS_ADC_TRIG5(REGTRIG)                   (((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM0_MTO)  || \
00451                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH0O) || \
00452                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH1O) || \
00453                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH2O) || \
00454                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM0_CH3O))
00455 #else
00456 #define IS_ADC_TRIG5(REGTRIG)                   (0)
00457 #endif

00459 #if (LIBCFG_PWM1)
00460 #define IS_ADC_TRIG6(REGTRIG)                   (((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM1_MTO)  || \
00461                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH0O) || \
00462                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH1O) || \
00463                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH2O) || \
00464                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_PWM1_CH3O))

00470 #define IS_ADC_TRIG7(REGTRIG)                   (((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_CMP0) || \
00471                                                  ((REGTRIG) == ADC_TRIG_CMP1))
00472 #else
00473 #define IS_ADC_TRIG7(REGTRIG)                   (0)
00474 #endif
00475 #endif
00476 
00477 #define ADC_INT_SINGLE_EOC                      (0x00000001)
00478 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_DISCON_MODE == 0)
00479 #define ADC_INT_SUB_GROUP_EOC                   (0x00000002)
00480 #endif
00481 #define ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC                       (0x00000004)
00482 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_WDT == 0)
00483 #define ADC_INT_AWD_LOWER                       (0x00010000)
00484 #define ADC_INT_AWD_UPPER                       (0x00020000)
00485 #endif
00486 #define ADC_INT_DATA_OVERWRITE                  (0x01000000)
00487 
00488 #define IS_ADC_INT(INT)                         ((((INT) & 0xFEFCFFF8) == 0) && ((INT) != 0))
00489 
00490 
00491 #define ADC_FLAG_SINGLE_EOC                     (0x00000001)
00492 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_DISCON_MODE == 0)
00493 #define ADC_FLAG_SUB_GROUP_EOC                  (0x00000002)
00494 #endif
00495 #define ADC_FLAG_CYCLE_EOC                      (0x00000004)
00496 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_WDT == 0)
00497 #define ADC_FLAG_AWD_LOWER                      (0x00010000)
00498 #define ADC_FLAG_AWD_UPPER                      (0x00020000)
00499 #endif
00500 #define ADC_FLAG_DATA_OVERWRITE                 (0x01000000)
00501 
00502 #define IS_ADC_FLAG(FLAG)                       ((((FLAG) & 0xFEFCFFF8) == 0) && ((FLAG) != 0))
00503 
00504 
00505 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA0                       (0)
00506 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA1                       (1)
00507 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA2                       (2)
00508 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA3                       (3)
00509 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_SEQ_4_7 == 0)
00510 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA4                       (4)
00511 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA5                       (5)
00512 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA6                       (6)
00513 #define ADC_REGULAR_DATA7                       (7)
00514 #endif
00515 
00516 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_SEQ_4_7)
00517 #define IS_ADC_REGULAR_DATA(DATA)               ((DATA) < 4)
00518 #else
00519 #define IS_ADC_REGULAR_DATA(DATA)               ((DATA) < 8)
00520 #endif
00521 
00522 #define ADC_AWD_DISABLE                         (u8)0x00
00523 #define ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER                       (u8)0x05
00524 #define ADC_AWD_ALL_UPPER                       (u8)0x06
00525 #define ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER_UPPER                 (u8)0x07
00526 #define ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER                    (u8)0x01
00527 #define ADC_AWD_SINGLE_UPPER                    (u8)0x02
00528 #define ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER_UPPER              (u8)0x03
00529 
00530 #define IS_ADC_AWD(AWD)                         (((AWD) == ADC_AWD_DISABLE)         || \
00531                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER)       || \
00532                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_ALL_UPPER)       || \
00533                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_ALL_LOWER_UPPER) || \
00534                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER)    || \
00535                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_SINGLE_UPPER)    || \
00536                                                  ((AWD) == ADC_AWD_SINGLE_LOWER_UPPER))
00537 
00538 #define IS_ADC_THRESHOLD(THRESHOLD)             ((THRESHOLD) < 4096)
00539 
00540 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00541 #define ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_SINGLE                 (0x00000001)
00542 #define ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_SUBGROUP               (0x00000002)
00543 #define ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_CYCLE                  (0x00000004)
00544 
00545 #define IS_ADC_PDMA(PDMA)                       (((PDMA) == ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_SINGLE)   || \
00546                                                  ((PDMA) == ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_SUBGROUP) || \
00547                                                  ((PDMA) == ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_CYCLE))
00548 #endif
00549 
00550 #define IS_ADC_INPUT_SAMPLING_TIME(TIME)        ((TIME) <= 255)
00551 
00552 #define IS_ADC_OFFSET(OFFSET)                   ((OFFSET) < 4096)
00553 
00554 
00555 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_NO_SEQ_4_7)
00556 #define IS_ADC_REGULAR_RANK(RANK)               ((RANK) < 4)
00557 #define IS_ADC_REGULAR_LENGTH(LENGTH)           (((LENGTH) >= 1) && ((LENGTH) <= 4))
00558 #else
00559 #define IS_ADC_REGULAR_RANK(RANK)               ((RANK) < 8)
00560 #define IS_ADC_REGULAR_LENGTH(LENGTH)           (((LENGTH) >= 1) && ((LENGTH) <= 8))
00561 #endif
00562 #define IS_ADC_REGULAR_SUB_LENGTH(SUB_LENGTH)   (((SUB_LENGTH) >= 1) && ((SUB_LENGTH) <= 8))
00563 
00564 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF)
00565 #if (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF_LEVEL_TYPE2)
00566 #define ADC_VREF_2V5                            (0ul << 4)
00567 #define ADC_VREF_3V0                            (1ul << 4)
00568 #define ADC_VREF_4V0                            (2ul << 4)
00569 #define ADC_VREF_4V5                            (3ul << 4)
00570 
00571 #define IS_ADC_VREF_SEL(SEL)                    ((SEL == ADC_VREF_2V5) || \
00572                                                  (SEL == ADC_VREF_3V0) || \
00573                                                  (SEL == ADC_VREF_4V0) || \
00574                                                  (SEL == ADC_VREF_4V5))
00575 #else
00576   #if LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF_DEFAULT_08V
00577   #define ADC_VREF_0V8                            (0ul << 4)
00578   #define ADC_VREF_DEFAULT                        ADC_VREF_0V8
00579   #else
00580   #define ADC_VREF_1V215                          (0ul << 4)
00581   #define ADC_VREF_DEFAULT                        ADC_VREF_1V215
00582   #endif
00583 #define ADC_VREF_2V0                            (1ul << 4)
00584 #define ADC_VREF_2V5                            (2ul << 4)
00585 #define ADC_VREF_2V7                            (3ul << 4)
00586 
00587 #define IS_ADC_VREF_SEL(SEL)                    ((SEL == ADC_VREF_DEFAULT) || \
00588                                                  (SEL == ADC_VREF_2V0)     || \
00589                                                  (SEL == ADC_VREF_2V5)     || \
00590                                                  (SEL == ADC_VREF_2V7))
00591 #endif
00592 #endif
00593 
00594 /**
00595   * @}
00596   */
